title: Upset at you, Board Users
body:
I come seeking advice as to what is acceptable behavior regarding taunts and I get "?" as acceptable taunting. For god's sake, they quote their champions on the left side here and we can't even go as far as copy them in all chat.

Perhaps it isn't your fault. Perhaps it is society that heeds the feelings of inept people who thrive on accusations of mistreatment where it was their own stupidity that caused the issue in the first place. Perhaps we have no choice but to let popularized things be so devoid of wit that we forgo speaking to each other and pretend that nobody ever deserves to be hurt.

Ugh, reality is harsher than that. I'm rather frustrated that I must be infuriatingly polite in a game about killing.

replies.body: You sound like a fun person to be around. Hopefully I'll never have a chance to meet someone like you in my life, it would make the rest of it amazing.

We don't comprehend (or appreciate) what "amazing" feels like until we experience the opposite...so shouldn't you be grateful to the "bad" for allowing you the privilege and perspective required to even know what "good" is?
